Name: Creative desicion making in soccer
ReferencesAndLinks: Fink, A., Bay, J. U., Koschutnig, K., Prettenthaler, K., Rominger, C., Benedek, M., Memmert, D. (2019). Brain and soccer: Functional patterns of brain activity during the generation of creative moves in real soccer decision-making situations. Human Brain Mapping, 40, 755–764. doi:10.1002/hbm.24408

Fink, A., Rominger, C., Benedek, M., Perchtold, C. M., Papousek, I., Weiss, E. M., Memmert, D. (2018). EEG alpha activity during imagining creative moves in soccer decision-making situations. Neuropsychologia, 118–124. doi:10.1016/j.neuropsychologia.2018.04.025

Memmert, D., Hüttermann, S., & Orliczek, J. (2013). Decide like Lionel Messi! The impact of regulatory focus on divergent thinking in sports. Journal of Applied Social Psychology, 43, 2163–2167. doi:10.1111/jasp.12159
